In 2025, major Chinese automakers will increasingly shift from broad multi‑brand expansion to internal consolidation and strategic integration, in response to a rapidly evolving market characterized by intensifying competition, rising cost pressures, and slowing growth in incremental demand. Several leading organizations publicly restructured brands, business units, and organizational systems to enhance operational efficiency and competitive positioning, according to [Sina](https://finance.sina.com.cn/jjxw/2025-12-29/doc-inhenaui7967491.shtml).
